CustomField.formula: "Mon: " & BLANKVALUE(Case__r.Network__r.Depot_Collection_Times_Monday__c, "N/A") & BR() & "Tue: " & BLANKVALUE(Case__r.Network__r.Depot_Collection_Times_Tuesday__c, "N/A") & BR() & "Wed: " & BLANKVALUE(Case__r.Network__r.Depot_Collection_Times_Wednesday__c, "N/A") & BR() & "Thu: " & BLANKVALUE(Case__r.Network__r.Depot_Collection_Times_Thursday__c, "N/A") & BR() & "Fri: " & BLANKVALUE(Case__r.Network__r.Depot_Collection_Times_Friday__c, "N/A") & BR() & "Sat: " & BLANKVALUE(Case__r.Network__r.Depot_Collection_Times_Saturday__c, "N/A") & BR() & "Sun: " & BLANKVALUE(Case__r.Network__r.Depot_Collection_Times_Sunday__c, "N/A")
CustomField.label: Depot Collection Hours
